ABOUT US

WHO ARE WE

ONYX Online is a digital marketing agency founded by two uOttawa graduates to target local business in Ottawa. We pride ourselves in our talents, quality service and most of all our work.

WHAT WE DO

We offer a variety of services that all work to make sure your business can start making sales online. Our most complete packages include webs design, social media, photography, PPC and more.

CO FOUNDERS:

Hassan Ahmed
hassan@onyxonline.ca
Evan Chan
evan@onyxonline.ca

Located right in downtown Ottawa and near the university the majority of our clients are businesses located in the capital but we love working outside of the city as well

GET IN TOUCH.

Let’s take the first steps together and we’ll turn your business into an online sensation. Fill out the form and our best people will reach out to you and we can start walking together on the beautiful road of success.
